title: Mazhaiye Mazhaiye Lyrics Eeram
stanzas:
Vizhiye vizhiye
pesum vizhiye
oru paarvai paarthaai
mazhaiye mazhaiye
nenjil mazhaiye

thaniye thaniye
vazhnthen thaniye
naan mannil mele
inime inime
neethaan thunaiye

[Mazhaiye mazhiye
thoovum mazhaiye
idhu kadhal thaanaa
thaniye thaniye
nanaithen mazhaiye

maname maname
theeyaai kothikkum
oru kaaichal pola
thaviyaai thaviyaai
thavithen mazhaiye ] (2)

ye naanthaan naanthaan
oru theevaai irukkindren
ye neethaan neeraai
enai suttri irukindraai(2)

uun aadai pattaale
oru saaral adikkiradhu
un orap punnaigaiyaal
perum thooral varugirathu

podhum po nee po
en kangal valikkiradhu
pode po nee po
en ulagam udaigiradhu

Vizhiye vizhiye
pesum vizhiye
oru paarvai paarthaai
mazhaiye mazhaiye
nenjil mazhaiye

thaniye thaniye
vazhnthen thaniye
naan mannil mele
inime inime
neethaan thunaiye

seo.title: Mazhaiye Mazhaiye Lyrics Eeram
seo.description: Get the complete Mazhaiye Mazhaiye Lyrics Eeram from Eeram. Read the lyrics penned by Viveka and composed by Thaman S and sung by Haricharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Viveka, Eeram, Thaman S, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
